sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When state is On-Hold > Awaiting Vendor a new date & time field appear and when the date& time arrives, the incident is moved back to 'in-progress'</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:35:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When selecting Awaiting vendor, the user will have to insert date & time to 'expeire' When the date & time arriavs, the incident will move back to ' in-progress'</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:35:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001072</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>State on-hold - Awaiting Vendor - date field</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-19 20:43:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>53cca45b4f6027007e72aa95d310c7a3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 09:47:18</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
